text: Lindsay Gordon Bristow (30 March 1888 – 4 September 1960) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Lindsay Bristow's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1888 births Category:1960 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:Australian military personnel of World War I
title: Lindsay Bristow
